DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance Karius Infectious Diseases Plasma Sequencing Assay patient present emergency room sepsis .
DOC.brief_title: SEP-SEQ Trial - Determining Etiology Sepsis Using Infectious Disease Diagnostic Sequencing Assay
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18 year old 2 . Meet 2 4 sepsis criterion 1 . Temperature > 38C < 36C 2 . Heart rate > 90 bpm 3 . Respiratory rate > 20 PaCO2 < 32mmHg 4 . WBC > 12000/µL < 4000/µL > 10 % band 1 . Inability understand instruction comply studyrelated procedure 2 . Any condition opinion treat physician prevent subject complete study .
